QueryDO.Name: Пикетные столбы
QueryDO.Description: Запрос выдает список пикетных столбов по всем главным путям в рамках указанной карты
QueryDO.Sql:
with sta as ( select row_number() over (order by mfa.map_fragment_gid, cai.axis_line_gids, cspi.distance) as rn, mfa.way_id_asup_putgl, mfa.map_fragment_gid, p.nom, cai.axis_line_gids, cspi.st_type, cspi.km, cspi.m, cspi.distance from REFDATA.STATIONING_CACHE_PICKET_INFO cspi join REFDATA.MAP_FRAGMENT_AXIS_LINE cai on cai.gid=cspi.AXIS_INFO_GID join REFDATA.MAP_FRAGMENT_AXIS mfa on mfa.gid=cai.map_fragment_axis_gid left outer join REFDATA.ASUP_PUTGL p on p.putgl_id=mfa.way_id_asup_putgl where mfa.map_fragment_gid = :p1 order by mfa.map_fragment_gid, cai.axis_line_gids, cspi.distance )
select a.way_id_asup_putgl as "Ид главного пути", a.axis_line_gids as "Ид линиии в карте", decode (a.st_type,0,'Существующий', 1, 'Рассчитанный', '') as "Тип столба", a.Km as "Км", a.m as "М", Round(a.distance,3) as "Расстояние от начала линии, м", Round(b.distance - a.distance,3) as "Расстояние до след. столба, м"
from sta a left outer join sta b on a.rn + 1 = b.rn and a.axis_line_gids = b.axis_line_gids and a.map_fragment_gid = b.map_fragment_gid order by a.rn
